                                throws java.io.InvalidObjectException
        Uses Twitch API to get stream info
        Parameters:
        node - Stream to get stream info for
        Returns:
        Stream info as StreamNode object
        Throws:
        java.io.InvalidObjectException - thrown when stream does not exist in Twitch database
